title: Maps en Go
description: Aprende a usar maps (diccionarios) en Go.
description_en: Learn to use maps (dictionaries) in Go.
explanation: Un 'map' almacena pares clave-valor, similar a un diccionario.
Se declara con la palabra reservada 'map' seguida de [TipoClave]TipoValor.
Se recorre con 'for clave, valor := range miMap { }'.
Ejemplo: map[string]string crea un map con claves y valores de tipo texto.
explanation_en: A 'map' stores key-value pairs, similar to a dictionary.
It is declared with the reserved word 'map' followed by [KeyType]ValueType.
It is iterated with 'for key, value := range myMap { }'.
Example: map[string]string creates a map with text keys and values.
